titleStmt.title: Act continuing the importation of Irish meal & oats, and allowing bear to be imported until the fifteen day of May next. Edinburgh, February 25th. 1696.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,
